main event: A round object, resembling the size of a medicine ball, was observed in Maywood, New Jersey on January 21, 1956.
interesting points: The object was described as having mixed colors of yellow, blue, and green with several tailing bodies behind it,It appeared to discharge gases during observation,The estimated speed of the object was 500 m.p.h.,The object was observed for about 15 seconds,The observer was a 68+ year old male plant guard.
witness description: The witness was a 68+ year old male plant guard.
